ComicInfo.Summary:
Vampirella? Cinderella: Vampirella is trapped by a magic collar by her stepmother and must serve her step sisters Angriffe and Sheleimhaute. Her Eerie Godmother helps her attend the ball where the prince frees her from her collar. She is then transported to her next tale.
Blue Beard: Blue Beard cautions Vampirella not to open the door locked with the golden key. She looks for an exit until she finally opens the forbidden door. Blue Beard attacks her and she kills him and is transported into the next story.
Feary Tales: Vampirella takes charge of her newly acquired property, the castle that formerly belonged to Lord Drago, King of the Nosferatu. She opens a Feary Tales book in the library and is transported into the story.
ComicInfo.Title: Vampirella? Cinderella; Blue Beard; Feary Tales
ComicInfo.Writer: Devin Grayson,John Shirley,Nancy A. Collins,John Shirley,Devin Grayson,Nancy A. Collins
